meanings.sent1: The pings of the microwave signaled that the food was ready.
meanings.sent2: I heard the pings of the wind chimes outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The pings of the tiny bell made the kitten jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The pings of raindrops on the roof created a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: The pings of the metal spoon against the glass echoed in the room.

meanings.definition: To make a high-pitched, short sound.
meanings.sent1: The metal pipe pings when you tap it lightly.
meanings.sent2: The old door pings every time it swings open.
meanings.sent3: The toy robot pings as it moves around the room.
meanings.sent4: The glass marble pings against the ceramic bowl.
meanings.sent5: The small pebble pings as it bounces off the ground.

meanings.definition: To send a quick, short message to a computer or device to check its status.
meanings.sent1: I will ping the server to see if it is responding.
meanings.sent2: The technician pings the network to troubleshoot the issue.
meanings.sent3: The computer program pings the devices for updates automatically.
meanings.sent4: The smartwatch pings my phone to remind me of appointments.
meanings.sent5: The security system pings the central monitoring station for alerts.
